name: SNAPPYANT

overview:
SNAPPYANT publishes digital interactive childrenâ€™s books for the iPad. The Companies prime objective is to create high quality apps that educate, engage and entertain Children. Snappyant has two directors Ana Vivas and Niki Bern:

Ana Vivas is a childrenâ€™s book publisher and has been working in the Childrenâ€™s book industry for fifteen years. She specialises in working on picture books and has extensive experience working with storyboarding, structural editing, and most importantly the working relationship with authors and illustrators. Her published books have won numerous awards.

Niki Bern is a visual effects artist and has worked on many ground breaking visual effects films such as, The Matrix Reloaded , Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, Flags of Our Fathers, Speed Racer, 2012, Avatar , Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga’Hoole and TRON: Legacy. She has extensive knowledge and experience working with the latest visual effects software by integrating live-action footage and computer generated imagery to create environments which look realistic and fantastic. Niki has lead various teams to create visual styles and final compositing for some of these major block buster films.

Snappyantâ€™s strengths come from the melding of the directors expertise in the film industry and Publishing industry to create childrenâ€™s interactive apps for the iPad.
